knimeNode.name: Potential Uncertainty Scorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates/Updates a density based exploration potential of a n-dimensional vector space.

fullDescription.intro:
Calculates/Updates the density based exploration potential of a n-dimensional vector space.
See Paper by Cebron et. al:
http://www.inf.uni-konstanz.de/bioml2/publications/Papers2009/CeBe09.pdf
fullDescription.option: Radius Alpha parameter, influences the size of the neighborhood considered for the density estimation.

ports.inPort: Rows labeled in the last iteration, the node will not perform the reduction step of the Node Potential algorithm if this port is not connected.
